formElement.label: Profile Name:
formElement.documentation: Specify unique name for the profile.Must not contain spaces or characters that are not valid such as any of the following: *, ?, ", <, >, ,, /, \, |, and so on.default profile name is <profile_type><profile_number>

formElement.label: Profile Path:
formElement.documentation: Specify the fully qualified path to the profile, which is referred to as the profile_root.Default is WS_WSPROFILE_DEFAULT_PROFILE_HOME/profileName.

formElement.label: Profile Template Path:
formElement.documentation: Specify the directory path to the template files in the installation root directory.

formElement.label: Host Name:
formElement.documentation: Specify the host name where you are creating the profile. This should match the host name that you specified during installation of the initial product. The default value for this parameter is the long form of the domain name system. The value for this parameter must be a valid IPv6 host name and must not contain spaces or any characters that are not valid such as the following: *, ?, ", <, >, ,, /, \, |, and so on.

formElement.label: Cell Name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the cell name of the profile.Not required for Application server profile.The value for this parameter must not contain spaces or any invalid characters that are not valid such as the following: *, ?, ", <, >, ,, /, \, |, and so on.

formElement.label: Node Name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the node name for the node that is created with the new profile.The value for this parameter must not contain spaces or any invalid characters that are not valid such as the following: *, ?, ", <, >, ,, /, \, |, and so on.

formElement.label: Server Name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the name of the server. Specify this parameter only for the default and secureproxy templates.The default server name is server1 for the default profile, and proxy1 for the secure proxy profile.

formElement.label: Administrative Security Credentials:
formElement.documentation: Specify Admin User and Admin Password if you want to enable administrative security for this profile.

option.name: Use port specified in next textbox as starting port(Do not use this option if you are using the managed profile template)
Use following file that defines port settings
Use default ports(Do not use this option if you are using the managed profile template)

formElement.label: Starting Port/Location of Port File:
formElement.documentation: Specify the starting port or the file that defines port setting for new profile.

formElement.label: Location of the manageprofile Script:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the manageprofile script, including filename and extension. i.e: 'manageprofiles.bat' or '/path/to/manageprofiles.sh' or 'C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere\AppServer\bin\manageprofiles.bat'.

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered to create a new profile.
